title: (x) Like the letters they teach you in kindergarten - MSDWT Manuscript {Joseph W}
content:
I sorta have this font (it shows up as MSDWT Manu on my font menu), but it's defective, so I'm wondering if (A) you know if it's a known font and where I can get a good copy or (B) if you know of something close.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142138im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40604.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Target "Save from top" - Cocktail Shaker {Chesh}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142138/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5628 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Fleetwood Mac "Rumours" - Letterhead Fonts/Nick Curtis {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142138/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5626 "Go to next forum topic")
author: figbash_acrobat

comments.content:
It's called MSDWT Manuscript and you can find it at: [http://www.mathdittos2.com/msdwt.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142138/http:/www.mathdittos2.com/msdwt.html)   
   
Joseph ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142138im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Hey, thanks. That clears that up. Too bad it's shareware: unfortunately, I can't get a "good copy" since this is all there is.   
   
I thought perhaps I just had the italic of some font, and was hoping to buy the complete font with roman, italic, bold, etc, but it turns out this is the whole thing. So....   
   
Does anyone know of any higher quality, non-shareware fonts that look similar to this? I will be eternally grateful.   
   
za
